author: mi-hol
body:
The same issue keeps reappearing with the current implementation of PowerBI based community dashboard
[see ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/7616)

The .pbix is not in this repository hence can't be updated by community
## Steps to reproduce

```
open https://msit.powerbi.com/view?r=eyJrIjoiYTYyN2U3ODgtMjBlMi00MGM1LWI0ZjctMmQ3MzE2ZDNkMzIyIiwidCI6IjcyZjk4OGJmLTg2ZjEtNDFhZi05MWFiLTJkN2NkMDExZGI0NyIsImMiOjV9&pageName=ReportSection5 

and check versions table
```

comments.author: fflaten
comments.body:
Is it about time to update this at least? 🙏 It doesn't show Windows 11 nor PS 7.0+.
Was hoping to find updated usage telemetry by OS version to properly tune CI testing stage.

title: Community dashboard -versions table requires manual update after each new pwsh version is released
